name: MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - DIRT BIK RACING GAME
name_original: MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - DIRT BIK RACING GAME
description:
MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE FUN ADDICTIVE RACING GAME - The Ultimate Challenge is a free racing game with awesome CUTE MOUSE CHARACTER , thrilling graphic designs, rocking musical score, and beautiful game scenes.

MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE FUN ADDICTIVE RACING GAME has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for IPAD , IPAD PRO ,iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 5S.

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of a MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE FUN ADDICTIVE RACING GAME .


Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider.

-Unique and smooth gameplay

- Addictive , exciting and hard levels

-Accelerometer support

-Earn stars for your best local times.

Lets PLAY MOTO MOUSE STUNT MANIA - FREE 3D XTREME DIRT BIKE FUN ADDICTIVE RACING GAME And Break The Top Score.
